Class InlineStyleFormattingContext

java.lang.Object
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.om.DefaultDeclarationFormattingContext
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.om.DefaultStyleFormattingContext
io.sf.carte.doc.style.css.om.InlineStyleFormattingContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeclarationFormattingContext, StyleFormattingContext, Serializable
public class InlineStyleFormattingContext extends DefaultStyleFormattingContext
A formatting context for inline styles.
